import React, { Component } from 'react' import {connect} from "react-redux" import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'; class Profile extends Component { render(){ if(!this.props.loginStat){ return } return(

  • Profile Page

  • Avatar

    Your Profile
    Image
    • Name : {this.props.userProfile.name}
    • Username : {this.props.userProfile.username}
    • Phone : {this.props.userProfile.phone}
    • Address : {this.props.userProfile.address}
) } } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ loginStat: state.AuthStat.login_status, userProfile: state.AuthStat.userData }) export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Profile);
